99d3d3e2-bb79-4e33-89be-4711b0919d87.description: This badge recognizes professionals and business leaders who have developed their competencies in the five steps to develop a solid business case framework and possess the capability to develop business cases that contribute to the success of their organizations. Professionals and business leaders have used My Business Case Hub® to help them reach their business case potential.
99d3d3e2-bb79-4e33-89be-4711b0919d87.name: Business Case Foundations

alignments.name: Microcredential
alignments.description: Our Business Case Microcredential Professional Certificates comply with the Australian National Microcredentials Framework 2021.

badge_template_activities.title: The Business Case Microcredential is recognition of your professional development and business capabilities. It provides proof of achievement of your learning outcomes and demonstrates your competence in developing and writing business cases.

Professionals and Business Leaders participate in a 2-hour workshop learning how to structure a business case, what information you need to include, and how to present the value of your project in a manner that helps get the necessary funding and support.
Professionals and business leaders learn how to use AI Tools to build your business case quickly and efficiently.
The training consists of a 2-hour live session using the My Business Case Hub® tools, templates and strategies to develop a solid business case.

f5a91816-cc16-4b37-bb6b-78d86f8376fd.description: A Business Case Masterclass digital badge is an award for business leaders and professionals who have completed the Chase Consulting business case masterclass program. They have the skills to construct a persuasive business case for executive and investor approval. These professionals and business leaders have used My Business Case Hub® to help them reach their business case potential.
f5a91816-cc16-4b37-bb6b-78d86f8376fd.name: Business Case Masterclass

alignments.name: Microcredential
alignments.description: Our Business Case Microcredential Professional Certificates comply with the Australian National Microcredentials Framework 2021.

badge_template_activities.title: The Business Case Microcredential is recognition of your professional development and business capabilities. It provides proof of achievement of your learning outcomes and demonstrates your competence in developing and writing business cases.

Professionals and Business Leaders participate in three 2-hour workshops learning how to write, develop and refine a comprehensive business case, monetize the outcomes and benefits of your proposal, and maximize the return on investment. They have learnt financial analysis techniques to quantify the value of the business case and demonstrate its potential impact.
Professionals and business leaders learn how to use AI Tools to build your business case quickly and efficiently.
The training consists of three 2-hour live sessions over three weeks using the My Business Case Hub® tools, templates and strategies to develop a solid business case.

25e54e59-522b-4bc0-a8a0-34bf052faa4b.description: The Deaf Children Australia's Business Case Masterclass Program digital badge is an award for those who have completed the Chase Consulting business case masterclass program. 25e54e59-522b-4bc0-a8a0-34bf052faa4b.name: Deaf Children Australia's Business Case Masterclass Program

alignments.name: Microcredential
alignments.description: Our Business Case Microcredential Professional Certificates comply with the Australian National Microcredentials Framework 2021.

badge_template_activities.title: The Business Case Microcredential is recognition of your professional development and business capabilities. It provides proof of achievement of your learning outcomes and demonstrates your competence in developing and writing business cases.

DCA's staff participated in four 2-hour workshops learning how to write, develop and refine their business cases. They developed the marketing strategy for two new programs, developing sales and revenue models. They have learnt financial analysis techniques to quantify the value of the business case and demonstrate its potential reach and impact for board approval.
Professionals and business leaders learnt how to develop a persuasive pitch deck for the DCA board presentation and approval.
The training consists of four 2-hour live sessions over six weeks using the My Business Case Hub® tools, templates and strategies to develop a solid business case.

01765746-cc52-4baf-be1e-e94dad9eef09.description: A Business Case Masterclass Trainer Digital Badge is an award to professionals who successfully delivered Chase Consulting's business case programs to business leaders and professionals. This badge recognizes trainers' commitment, expertise, and contributions to developing compelling business case skills that enable individuals and organizations to make informed decisions. This digital badge signifies mastery in using My Business Case Hub® modern tools and approaches.

Professionals and Business Leaders participate in an online course of 6 modules and over 24 lessons learning how to structure a business case, what information you need to include, and how to present the value of your project in a manner that helps get the necessary funding and support.
